dialog.text: Spoke to Jeff earlier and he's still slaving away but I am sure he'll be fine.  I had a message from Tanya this morning gloating that she had already submitted her portfolio - made me panic and check the deadline time again!  Have you submitted yet?

joins.text: Well done, I am so proud of you!

dialog.text: We have a couple of weeks left but I wanted to get mine in before the holidays start as I need to work more hours to get some cash together.   I finally managed to submit my work just now 😃, took 3 hours to upload :frowning:  After the first hour, Mum was shouting up the stairs as it was interfering with her watching Netflix - oops!    Mum's making my favourite tonight - sausage and mash, and I'll some wine to celebrate.  You doing anything special?

Thanks for all your support this semester - I couldn't have done it without you.  Got to go now - need to get Mum some flowers for being so great.  I hope you get your submission in.  Have a good Christmas!
